category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEPasteDuplicateResourceFromClassification
preference.preference_description: Specifies the behavior of the copy-paste of non-assembly resources from Classification to Manufacturing Process Planner (MPP). If the copied resource is an assembly, then default cloning rules will be applied, regardless of the preference value. Valid Values: * true: the copied resources are referenced in the MPP structure. * false: the copied resources are duplicated in the MPP structure. This is the default value.
